column1: Baby Barnaby's////If you read my last review
column2: you know I think this place is awesome. Yet
column3: the seating situation is ridiculous! Last time I went to BBC (not the channel) was for memorial day weekend Saturday Brunch and the wait was over 30 minutes! Please don't forget to write your name on the list hanging outside
column4: or your wait will be extended at least 10 minutes! I refuse to take any stars away because I understand why they are so busy... the food is Freaking great!
